# gpwm

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of gpwm is to supply functions for analysis of PWM motifs using the misha package.

## Installation

You can install the gpwm from github with:

```r
remotes::install_github("aviezerl/gpwm")
```
